reviews.review_msg: Best French prof I've had, in that I have learnt the most with her. She is a straight up kind of lady, takes no BS, but she is kind and you will improve. Be ready to participate and complete your homework. I had her for 222 and 215 this semester and I'm not sick of her. Smart, knows what's she's doing. The classes take a bit of work, but manageable
I love her, she explaines everthing very well, the work is little bit hard but is not that hard, just a little bit....
